name: Flying Bones (Elyxios)
description:
PITCH :

Flying Bones is a 3D platformer game where you control a little skeleton. On his island he sees an incoming storm, climbing flying islands and taking shelter in the temple is his only way to survive.

CONTROLS : 

(W, A, S, D to move & Space bar to jump)

THE TEAM : 

Game Artist : Samuel MEBREK

Portfolio (https://samuelmebrek3c39.myportfolio.com/)

Instagram (samxuel__dw)

Game Designer : Loïc MEDWID

Portfolio (https://loicmedwid.myportfolio.com)

Game Programmer : Pierre MARIOTTE 

Portfolio (https://pierremariotte98.wixsite.com/portfolio)
